how to enable compiz effects with ati x1: What happens when you try to enable them using gnome-appearance-properties?
Can you pastebin the output of compiz --replace from your terminal to pastebin.org?
Pastebin the output of LIBGL_DEBUG=verbose glxinfo and your X log, /var/log/Xorg.0.log
Need to see the whole file
As I suspected. Did you upgrade from 9.10?

You need to uninstall the nvidia glx module that got installed by mistake during the upgrade. To do that, run dpkg -l|grep nvidia and remove all the packages with ii next to their name. Then restart X and it should work
